name: NRS High Tide Jacket - Women's
description: Keep the weather on the outside. This waterproof anorak uses breathable fabric, and offers a full range of motion for drawing, sweeping and prying. The hood features a flexible stiff brim that you can shape around your face, with drawcords to cinch in excess volume.40-denier nylon has a DWR coating to shed precipitation and water.Waterproof-breathable HyproTex 2.5-layer fabric.Hood has multiple adjustment points with a flexible stiff brim.1/2 front water-tight zip.Gripper cuffs adjust with Velcro® tabs.Drawcord hem.2 zippered sleeve pockets.
